attributes.action: Make the blood test for obstetric cholestasis routine in pregnancy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Last year my daughter was stillborn due to Obstetric cholestasis which went undetected as I didn't have the main symptoms. I've since found of another woman had to go through this and god knows how many more. In my opinion its 2 babies to many when its easily preventable. I want to make the simple blood test routine for pregnant women to prevent anyone else needing to go through this.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Make the blood test for obstetric cholestasis routine in pregnancy."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14551.asp

Prime Minister's Office
